column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I was able to get a great table and the private party coordinators (Alison and Michelle) had me choose various cold tapas
column3: and desserts and made them into a cute pre-fixed menu! This eliminated the pressure of any decision making for such a large group. The food came out quickly and one right after the other...just as we were finishing up with one tapa
column4: the next was being served. It helped that we had a stellar waiter. Everyone LOVED the food
column5: and the sangria was yummy as ever.
